name: UW Sentinel-1 InSAR
description: Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR) processing results of Copernicus (http://www.esa.int/Our_Activities/Observing_the_Earth/Copernicus) Sentinel-1 data. Retrieved from ASF DAAC (https://www.asf.alaska.edu) 01 July 2018, processed by ESA. Derivative products processed with InSAR Scientific Computing Environment - ISCE (https://winsar.unavco.org/software/isce), using the dinoSAR Cloud-computing package (https://github.com/scottyhq/dinosar)
